ygData.subject: Re: staff of observers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Honestly, I don t fully remember how I spent level 21, but, if I think I got this right, I was hunting gnolls at Highhold, mainly for the good faction
ygData.messageBody:
According to PHAEDRA WHITLOCK:
> Im here. Fighting my way out of Lvl 21. Or trying to... So few good places to hunt, so few people to group with. *sighs*
>
> Piecemealing it is taking awhile. Spent a morning camping Emperor Crush and Dvinn, afternon at the Gorge slaying Eyes, Evening Aviaks. So boring, and this stuff will be green at 22 I suspect (well, not the aviaks, but those are Soooooo camped).

Honestly, I don't fully remember how I spent level 21, but, if I think I got
this right, I was hunting gnolls at Highhold, mainly for the good faction hits.
Most of these were still blue, so they gave good xp, at least until people
started to appear and camp them too.
(unlike orc side, gnoll side cannot support more than three-four people)

--
